hits.name: Monzo Bank
hits.long_description:
YC has written a good overview of our business on their blog: https://blog.ycombinator.com/monzo-makes-money-work-for-everyone/

Our mission is to make money work for everyone. We do that by building a mobile-first bank account for individuals and businesses.

Founded in 2015, we now have 5 million customers in the UK and are expanding into the US. Our product competes directly with high street banks and has strong product market fit, with a 58% weekly active user rate even years after signing up. We're 2000+ staff (~400 of which make up the product/tech team), and backed by YC, Stripe, Mike Moritz, Eric Schmidt and others

Internally, we encourage an open, collaborative, inclusive working environment. We contribute to open source software, and we continually engage with our wonderful community. We're hiring talented, creative problem-solvers to help us build the bank of the future. Join us!
hits.one_liner: A bank as smart as your phone.

hits.name: Convoy
hits.long_description:
Convoy is the nation's leading digital freight network. We move millions of truckloads around the country through our connected network of carriers, saving money for shippers, increasing earnings for drivers, and eliminating carbon waste for our planet. 

Interested in working on an $800B problem? 
Check out our jobs page here: http://jobs.convoy.com/
hits.one_liner: The world's most efficient digital freight network.
hits.subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
